==Ocsimore's forum extension==

===Wiki syntax===

{{{<<forum_message_list forum="1">>}}}

{{{<<forum_thread forum="1">>}}}

{{{<<forum_message forum="1">>}}}

===Group hierarchy===

====For all forums====
{{{
   forum_creators
}}}

====For each forum====
{{{
                                                   \     /
                                               moderated_readers                
                                   __________/        |
                            \  /  /                \  |  /
        \     /            readers                _creators                                    \   /
  deletors_if_creators        |                       |                                    modifiers_if_creator
         \ | /              \ | /                  \  |  /                   \  /              \ | /
       _deletors         _moderators      _creators_not_moderated         ..._sticky_setters  _modifiers
               \________________\_______________      |      ____________/_____________________/
                                                 forum_admin

                                                    admin


}}}


====For each forum wiki (messages or comments)====
{{{
                                                        forum_visible
                                                              |
                                                 _readersifmessagemoderated
                         _______________________/         /   |   \        \____________
                        /                                /    |    \                    \
 deletors_if_creator   /                                /     |     \                    \      modifiers_if_creator
          |           /                                /      |      \                    \          |
_deletors = wikiboxdel  _readersnotmod = wikiboxreaders   _creators    _sticky_setters      modifiers = wikiboxwriters
                                       |               \      |
                                 _moderators  _creators_notmod = wikiboxcreators

                                                  admin
}}}
